function lua_do()
--https://c.radikal.ru/c23/2007/79/971973938f6f.png ведьма
--https://d.radikal.ru/d12/2007/0e/da8488b07c11.jpg
<s>timages.witch.isVisible = false
<s>timages.background.isVisible = false
<s>ttown = {}
<s>tsize = canvas.width * 2
<s>ttown[1] = display.newImageRect(canvasGroup, nameForImages("https://d.radikal.ru/d12/2007/0e/da8488b07c11.jpg"), system.TemporaryDirectory, size, canvas.height)
<s>ttown[2] = display.newImageRect(canvasGroup, nameForImages("https://d.radikal.ru/d12/2007/0e/da8488b07c11.jpg"), system.TemporaryDirectory, size, canvas.height)
<s>ttown[1].anchorX, town[1].anchorY = 0, 0
<s>ttown[2].anchorX, town[2].anchorY = 0, 0
<s>ttown[2].x = size
<s>tfunction move(self, event)
<s>t<s>tif self.x then
<s>t<s>t<s>tif self.x < -size then
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>tself.x = size * 0.99
<s>t<s>t<s>telse
<s>t<s>t<s>t<s>tself.x = self.x - 5
<s>t<s>t<s>tend
<s>t<s>tend
<s>tend
<s>ttown[1].enterFrame = move
<s>ttown[2].enterFrame = move
<s>tRuntime:addEventListener("enterFrame", town[1])
<s>tRuntime:addEventListener("enterFrame", town[2])
<s>twitch = display.newImageRect(canvasGroup, nameForImages("https://c.radikal.ru/c23/2007/79/971973938f6f.png"), system.TemporaryDirectory, canvas.height / 2, canvas.height / 2)
<s>twitch.x, witch.y = canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2
<s>tfunction moveWitch(direction)
<s>t<s>ttransition.moveBy(witch, {y = direction * canvas.height / 10, time = 1000, transition = easing.inOutSine, onComplete = function() if canvas.height and witch.removeSelf then moveWitch(-direction) end end})
<s>tend
<s>tmoveWitch(-1)
end
